NAME.Nominative: Wednesday of the Fifth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Wednesday of the Fifth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1st Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: The pains of the saints, which they suffered for Thee, O Lord, be as supplications, and all our pains do Thou heal, O Lover of mankind, we pray.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: It is good to give praise unto the Lord
and to chant unto Thy name, O Most High
SEXTE.STICHOS: To proclaim in the morning Thy mercy, and Thy truth by night.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.STICHOS: The Lord is clothed with strength and He hath girt Himself.
